story: joined E&Y as Audit Intern after third attempt while being a full-time economics student
joined E&Y as Audit Intern after third attempt while being a full-time economics student

joined FP&a to assist with IPO preparation while being a full-time economics student
- took over the corporate financial forecasting model by improving it

moved to the corporate HQ in Newtown, PA
- reported directly to two (consecutive) CFOs
- transferred my legacy to FP&a and started working with the Clients

joined for a three-day discovery business trip as a Consultant
- stayed for eight months as a key member
over 25 four-day business trips in a year
moved to San Francisco Bay Area

started as a Data Architect
- accumulated more knowledge than anyone else while working on the new Data model
- started consulting the Client on their own product

changed the initial application core idea
- came up with the ideas of almost all the core features
- scrutinized hundreds of webpages for bits and pieces of business Data

got extended three times
- worked closely with the corporate Data team
- provided tools for dozens of teams
